title: Success Cases
description: Explore our portfolio of exceptional web development and custom automation workflows that drive results for businesses around the world.

prospectingLeads.title: Automated Prospecting

prospectingLeads.description: Automation built with n8n for automatic capture and organization of leads via Google Maps, generating qualified spreadsheets on Google Drive.
